text: Mut-Ashkur (a Hurrian name) was the king of Assyria from 1730 BC to 1720 BC. He was the son and successor of Ishme-Dagan. His father arranged for him to marry the daughter of the Hurrian king Zaziya.Who's who in the ancient Near East By Gwendolyn Leick ==References== Category:18th-century BC Assyrian kings Category:Assyrian kings Category:18th-century BC rulers
title: Mut-Ashkur
